document_data.name: Vlomina
document_data.mainbody:
'''Vlomina''' was a dutiful hireling guard who worked for [[Baldur's Mouth]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|'''Fraid I'll have to ask you to stop there. Only Ettvard's allowed to use the basement elevator.''|Guard Vlomina}}
document_data.Description: Vlomina was a fair-skinned [[gold dwarven]] woman with brown eyes and short-trimmed brown hair. She trimmed her facial hair short, in contrast with many other dwarven women who were either clean-shaven to grew their beards out.
document_data.Possessions: Guard Vlomina was equipped with a [[chainmail]] uniform of Baldur's Mouth's guards and armed with a simple [[mace]] and [[wood]]en [[shield]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Vlomina was employed by Baldur's Mouth and its editor-in-chief, [[Ettvard Needle]]. She was tasked with guarding the elevator that descended into Baldur's Mouth's off-limits basement. None were allowed to pass without Ettvard's permission.
